Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

GeoCoordinates.description: GeoCoordinates represents a geographic location using WGS84 coordinates.

HeadlineSummary.description: HeadlineSummary represents an AI-generated summary of recent headlines.

generatedAt.description: Summary generation time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

ListNewsItemsRequest.description: ListNewsItemsRequest specifies filters for retrieving news items.

alertsOnly.description: Whether to return only alert-level items.

ListNewsItemsResponse.description: ListNewsItemsResponse contains news items matching the request.

NewsItem.description: NewsItem represents a single news article from RSS feed aggregation.

isAlert.description: Whether this article triggered an alert condition.

publishedAt.description: Publication time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

PaginationRequest.description: PaginationRequest specifies cursor-based pagination parameters for list endpoints.

cursor.description: Opaque cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string for the first page.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return per page (1 to 100).

PaginationResponse.description: PaginationResponse contains pagination metadata returned alongside list results.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string indicates no more pages.

totalCount.description: Total count of items matching the query, if known. Zero if the total is unknown.

SummarizeArticleRequest.description: SummarizeArticleRequest specifies parameters for LLM article summarization.

geoContext.description: Geographic signal context to include in the prompt.

variant.description: Variant: "full", "tech", or target language for translate mode.

SummarizeArticleResponse.description: SummarizeArticleResponse contains the LLM summarization result.

cached.description: Whether the result came from Redis cache.

error.description: Error message if the request failed.

fallback.description: Whether the client should try the next provider in the fallback chain.

skipped.description: Whether this provider was skipped (credentials missing).

tokens.description: Token count from the LLM response.

SummarizeHeadlinesRequest.description: SummarizeHeadlinesRequest specifies parameters for headline summarization.

maxHeadlines.description: Maximum number of headlines to include in the summary.

SummarizeHeadlinesResponse.description: SummarizeHeadlinesResponse contains the AI-generated headline summary.

ThreatClassification.description: ThreatClassification represents an AI-assessed threat level for a news item.

level.description: ThreatLevel represents the assessed threat level of a news event.

TimeRange.description:
TimeRange represents a time interval defined by a start and end timestamp.
 Used for filtering data within a specific time period.

end.description: End of the time range (inclusive), as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

start.description: Start of the time range (inclusive), as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

post.description: ListNewsItems retrieves news articles from RSS feed aggregation.
SummarizeArticle generates an LLM summary with provider selection and fallback support.
SummarizeHeadlines generates an AI summary of recent headlines using Groq or OpenRouter.
